description: Collaborated effectively with a team on an Angular-based data dashboard, improving data visualization efficiency.
Played a key role in the successful delivery of 2 major project milestones ahead of schedule.
Gained hands-on experience in full-stack web development, using Angular for frontend, Springboot for backend, and MongoDB for data storage.
Led a team of 5 developers, ensuring best coding practices, enhancing project outcomes, and fostering team unity.
Constructed and deployed club website and streamlined deployment via GitHub, reducing overhead by 90%.
Strengthened club website security and reliability using Hostinger and Firebase, attracting over 1,000 daily users.
Designed 5+ web pages for MindSpark 21 website, aiding deployment and attracting 100K+ monthly visitors.
Assisted in the Mindspark website deployment, showcasing technical skills and teamwork.
